title: Suricata - Overview
description: - This dashboard provides an overview of events generated in Suricata.

definition.content:
The Suricata Overview dashboard offers a high-level summary of network security events, providing critical insights into overall network activity. 

This dashboard is essential for network administrators and security analysts to monitor network traffic, quickly detect anomalies, and investigate potential security incidents.

For more information, see the [Suricata Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/suricata).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

## About Count of Events by Type Panel

- To filter out the dashboard for respective event type, follow the below mentioned step.
  - Click on the desired 'Event-Type' and select the 'Set Event-Type'
  - Alternatively, user can add the filters value manually via filters given on the top of the dashboard.

definition.title: Top 10 Source IP by Source Port
Top 10 Destination IP by Destination Port

definition.content: Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Suricata logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
